trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestisce il **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento di un <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler è definito per l' <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento della <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento del <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>classe specificando una subroutine denominata **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event and is used to ensure that the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> is populated with an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento viene generato dopo il <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>evento e viene utilizzato per verificare che il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>viene popolato con un <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs>oggetto fornito per il **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento per impostare il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>su un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> supplied during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that contains no user information.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>fornito durante il **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, il <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>Imposta il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>per un <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>oggetto che non contiene informazioni utente.</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event and before the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Il **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento viene generato dopo il <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>evento e prima di <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest>eventi.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> can affect the behavior of your application.
trans-unit.target: Se si dispone di una sezione che dipende dal nome utente per negare o consentire l'accesso all'applicazione, la modifica di <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>possono influenzare il comportamento dell'applicazione.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the section in your configuration.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi che il nome utente impostato durante la **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento viene considerato quando si specifica la sezione della configurazione.
